column5: We've been coming up to the Kawarthas for 37 yrs.  What do we need ( PA & NY residents) as far as boater certificates?  We have passports, insurance on boats, some have resident state safe boater's certificates.  We all have our "outdoor cards" from Ontario...  Thanks For the info!!
As long as your boat(s) contain the safety items needed in your home State. You don't need a card for here unless you stay here for more than 45 days.
The "no boaters card required" Roy mentioned only applies to the boats owner. Us / State issued safe boaters cards are also acceptable.
